Here's a question.

Did people actually hate the Movie despicable Me, Or just the Minions _in_ said movie?

topics.body:

topics.body:
"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5591c32f6368723cf3000c36#post_5591c32f6368723cf3000c36
It's the Jack Sparrow problem. Despicable Me 1 and 2 were solid kid's movies and I actually do find some of the Minion bits to be funny. But the Minions don't have enough genuine character about them to support a 90 minute feature. They serve as a good buffer but not as a main attraction.
